HOLD/HATCH COVERS: 5/5
CARGO GEAR                    : 4 X 30 MT MACGREGOR CRANE
GRABS                                 : 4 X 12 CUBM
GRABS CAPACITY : 6.0 TO 12 M3 DEPENDING ON THE DENSITY OF THE CARGO.
VESSELS CRANES / GRABS TO BE OPERATED BY QUALIFIED SHORE PERSONEL
EMPLOYED AND PAID BY CHRTRS AT CHRTRS ENTIRE RISK / RESPONSIBILITY
AND EXPENSE. IN CASE CHRTS WILL USE VSLS GRABS , TO GIVE MASTER FULL
DESCRIPTION OF THE CARGO WITH ITS ACTUAL/CORRECT DENSITY SO AS TO
ADJUST THE GRABS IF NECESSARY.
SPEED AND CONSUMPTION :
BALLAST : ABT 14K ON ABT 27 T VLSFO 380 CST, NDAS
LADEN   : ABT 13,5K ON ABT 29 T VLSFO 380 CST, NDAS
ALTERNATIVE:
BALLAST : ABT 13K ON ABT 24 T VLSFO 380 CST, NDAS
LADEN   : ABT 13K ON ABT 27 T VLSFO 380 CST, NDAS
CONSUMPTION AT PORT:  IDLE ABT 2.5 MTS VLSFO 380 CST / WW ABT 4.5 MTS VLSFO 380 CST / BOILER AT PORT : 1.0 MTS VLSFO 380 CST OR LSMGO
SPEED AND CONSUMPTION CLAIMS ARE ALWAYS BASED ON GOOD WEATHER CONDITIONS UP TO BEAUFORT FORCE 4 AND DOUGLAS SEASCALE 3 ,SIGNIFICANT WAVE HEIGHT LIMIT OF 1.25M WITH NO ADVERSE CURRENTS AND ALWAYS UP TO SUMMER LOADLINE.THE EFFECT OF THE POSITIVE CURRENTS NOT TO BE DEBITED AGAINST THE VESSEL. AN ADMISSIBLE PERIOD OF GOOD WEATHER HAS TO BE A PERIOD OF 24 CONSECUTIVE HOURS RUNNING. “ABOUT” MEANS HAVING AN ALLOWANCE OF MINUS 0,5 KNOT ON SPEED AND +5% ON BUNKER CONSUMPTION ONLY. EXTRA POLATION OF GOOD WEATHER PERFORMANCE FOR BAD WHEATHER PERIODS IS NOT ALLOWED .WEATHER ROUTING COMPANY AWT(STORMGEO) IS BLACKLISTED AND WILL NOT BE USED.
THE VESSEL IS ENTITLED TO USE LSMGO FOR MAIN ENGINE/GENERATOR ENGINES WHEN MANOEUVERING IN NARROW/SHALLOW WATERS, SAILING TROUGH HEAVY TRAFFIC OR BAD WEATHER, CANALS, RIVERS, IN/OUT PORT, SHIFT OF GENERATOR ENGINE, BALLASTING AND DEBALLASTING OPERATIONS, STOPPING/STARTING THE ENGINES, POOR VISIBILITY ETC  UNDER THE DISCRETION OF THE MASTER.
FUEL SPECIFICATIONS OF FUEL USED IN MAIN ENGINE AND GENERATORS OR BOILER CAN BE ALTERED AS REQUIRED IN CERTAIN EMISSION CONTROLE ZONES SUCH AS STATED IN ANNEX VI OF MARPOL 73/78 AS AMENDED AND/OR OTHER ZONES REGULATED BY REGIONAL AND OR NATIONAL AUTHORITIES SUCH AS BUT NOT LIMITED TO E.U. AND U.S. ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION AGENCIES WITH REGARDS TO MAXIMUM FUEL SULPHUR CONTENTS REQUIREMENTS WHEN TRADING IN SUCH ZONES.
CHARTERERS CONFIRM TO SUPPLY BUNKER WHICH SPECS NOT LESS THAN NET 10200 KCAL/KG OR NET 42700 KJ/KG.
SUITABLE FOR GRAB DISCH : YES
CO2 FITTED : YES
SUEZ/PANAMA FITTED : YES
HOLD VENTILATION : NATURAL
AHL FITTED : YES
ALL DETAILS ABOUT
END
Regards
